channel.title: work on Long Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in work on Long Thoughts

item.title: The art of Approach
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: A post hyperfocussing only on the element of approach, it’s impact and implications. Which role does approach play in day-to-day lifes? What significance does it have, and what difference does it make?

item.title: Emacs Config Updates
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: Highlights of recent config changes to my code editor, my text vehicle, my passion project: emacs.

item.title: Getting stuff done is not about getting stuff done
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: About the question whether doing a task is only about getting it done, and why there is no such thing as no progress.

item.title: Top 5 Interview Questions
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: For the past couple months I went on a lengthy job hunt. Let me share with you the top questions I received during that time.

item.title: Motivational Tides
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: I find motivation at work to adhere to certain laws. How can motivation be fostered and how is it drowned? A quick read on the aspect of variance and choice.

item.title: On Growing in a Company
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: A quick read on the impact of company style on personal growth.
